body:
I'm not sure if I was allowed to make a 2nd thread about my channel but ok..

Welcome to my new series....

HOW DID I MEET.....?

Basically, I go into a skype call with someone and i explain to youtube how we met and how big our friendship is. I did make a video on it but the audio fked up so if you wanna watch that its my "Im back babies" video.




REQUIREMENTS:
  • We must be casual+ friends
  •  We must of met somewhere....
